name: Pond Pirates
description:
A game about two boys on a self made pirate ship on a mission to clean the pond!

controls:

- WASD/ARROW keys to move

- LEFT MOUSE to shoot

- SHIFT to dash

- use MOUSE to aim

- E to buy upgrades

Health system:

When you get hit, plastic builds up on your ship and once there is too much plastic, your ship will sink. 

To complete the game: To beat the game you'll have to defeat the end boss. Along the way you can buy upgrades from two sellers to help you defeat the boss. 

The first one being: the blobfish: He only eats plastic and would love to help you clean the plastic waste build up on your boat! You're able to choose from three different upgrades in exchange for your plastic. Buying an upgrade automatically heals you. 

Last but definitely not least meet  the goose! The goose likes his pond clean, so be sure to "recycle" plastic pieces by killing them and once you have recycled enough, you can get an outstanding upgrade from him! Be careful though, once you have too much plastic build up on your ship, he won't accept a deal!
